The '''Cryo Archon''' is the god among [[The Seven]] who presides over [[Snezhnaya]], the land of [[Cryo]]. At least two holders of this title are known:
# The [[Belyi Tsar]], the first Cryo Archon, whose followers are known as the [[Snowland Fae]]
# The [[Tsaritsa]], the current Cryo Archon, who is seeking to collect the other Archons' [[Gnoses]] for unknown reasons

[[es:Arconte Cryo]]
